title: Developer documentation and required generated static assets

requirements.summary: Add English developer documentation describing project structure, entry files, and local/deployment workflows for frontend and IC canister.
acceptanceCriteria: A new root documentation file exists (e.g., README.md) that explicitly points to backend/main.mo as the backend entry point and frontend/src/App.tsx as the frontend app entry point.

Documentation includes local development steps for the frontend (install dependencies, run dev server) and for the IC canister (dfx start/deploy workflow), referencing the existing frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md where appropriate.
Documentation is written in English and includes a brief high-level directory tree (frontend vs backend) so a user can locate code quickly.

file_operations.description: Create developer documentation in English that explains where frontend/ and backend/ code lives, calls out frontend/src/App.tsx and backend/main.mo as main entry files, includes a brief directory tree, and documents local run steps (frontend dev server + dfx workflow) while referencing frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md for production deployment details.
Add a short section/link pointing developers to frontend/README.md for project structure and entry-file orientation, keeping all added/modified user-facing text in English.

requirements.summary: Ensure referenced SEO/static images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames used by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The files /assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg and /assets/generated/car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The app loads without broken image links where /assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg is used (e.g., in frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx and frontend/index.html).

file_operations.description: Add the required social share/SEO preview image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg so existing references (e.g., frontend/index.html and frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx) resolve without broken links.
Add the required wide hero banner image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg so the existing Hero image reference resolves without broken links.
